languages.text: "Тогда... трепет?" {n}Взгляд Иокасты упирается в вашу шею, туда, где из-под воротника выглядывает небольшой шрам. Зрачки ее расширяются, язык непроизвольно скользит по губам.{/n} "Мысли о том, что вы вынесли, заставляют меня... трепетать".

"Then what about... awe?" {n}She stares at your neck, right at the scar peeking out from under your collar. Her pupils dilate, and she licks her lips involuntarily.{/n} "Thinking about what you have suffered leaves me... trembling."
languages.original_text: "Тогда... трепет?" {n}Взгляд Иокасты упирается в вашу шею, туда, где из-под воротника выглядывает небольшой шрам. Зрачки ее расширяются, язык непроизвольно скользит по губам.{/n} "Мысли о том, что вы вынесли, заставляют меня... трепетать".

traits.locale_text: "Then what about... awe?" {n}She stares at your neck, right at the scar showing from under your collar. Her pupils dilate, and she licks her lips involuntarily.{/n} "Thinking about what you have suffered leaves me... trembling."

"Then what about... awe?" {n}She stares at your neck, right at the scar peeking out from under your collar. Her pupils dilate, and she licks her lips involuntarily.{/n} "Thinking about what you have suffered leaves me... trembling."

languages.text: "Wie wäre es dann mit ... Ehrfurcht?" {n}Sie starrt auf die Narbe, die unter deinem Kragen hervorlugt. Ihre Pupillen werden weiter und sie leckt sich unbewusst die Lippen.{/n} "Der Gedanke, was Ihr erleiden musstet, lässt mich ... zittern."
languages.original_text: "Then what about... awe?" {n}She stares at your neck, right at the scar peeking out from under your collar. Her pupils dilate, and she licks her lips involuntarily.{/n} "Thinking about what you have suffered leaves me... trembling."

traits.locale_text: "Wie wäre es dann mit ... Ehrfurcht?" {n}Sie starrt auf die Narbe, die unter deinem Kragen hervorlugt. Ihre Pupillen werden weiter und sie leckt sich unbewusst die Lippen.{/n} "Der Gedanke, was Ihr erleiden musstet, lässt mich ... zittern."

languages.text: « Un certain... respect mêlé de crainte, alors ? {n}Elle fixe votre cou du regard, à l'endroit précis où la cicatrice apparaît, sous votre col. Ses pupilles se dilatent et elle se lèche involontairement les lèvres.{/n} Je... je tremble à la seule pensée de ce que vous avez subi. »
languages.original_text: "Then what about... awe?" {n}She stares at your neck, right at the scar peeking out from under your collar. Her pupils dilate, and she licks her lips involuntarily.{/n} "Thinking about what you have suffered leaves me... trembling."

traits.locale_text: « Un certain... respect mêlé de crainte, alors ? {n}Elle fixe votre cou du regard, à l'endroit précis où la cicatrice apparaît, sous votre col. Ses pupilles se dilatent et elle se lèche involontairement les lèvres.{/n} Je... je tremble à la seule pensée de ce que vous avez subi. »

languages.text: «¿Y si le dijera que es... fascinación?». {n}Clava la mirada en la cicatriz que apenas asoma por debajo del cuello de tu camisa. Sus pupilas se dilatan, y se relame involuntariamente.{/n} «Me... estremezco solo con pensar en los sufrimientos que ha padecido».
languages.original_text: "Then what about... awe?" {n}She stares at your neck, right at the scar peeking out from under your collar. Her pupils dilate, and she licks her lips involuntarily.{/n} "Thinking about what you have suffered leaves me... trembling."

traits.locale_text: «¿Y si le dijera que es... fascinación?». {n}Clava la mirada en la cicatriz que apenas asoma por debajo del cuello de tu camisa. Sus pupilas se dilatan, y se relame involuntariamente.{/n} «Me... estremezco solo con pensar en los sufrimientos que ha padecido».

languages.text: 「ならば…畏敬の念は？」{n}彼女はあなたの首筋を、襟元から覗く傷跡をじっと見つめる。その瞳孔が開き、無意識に唇を舐めている。{/n}「あなたが経験された苦痛を思うと…震えが止まりません」
languages.original_text: "Then what about... awe?" {n}She stares at your neck, right at the scar peeking out from under your collar. Her pupils dilate, and she licks her lips involuntarily.{/n} "Thinking about what you have suffered leaves me... trembling."

traits.locale_text: 「ならば…畏敬の念は？」{n}彼女はあなたの首筋を、襟元から覗く傷跡をじっと見つめる。その瞳孔が開き、無意識に唇を舐めている。{/n}「あなたが経験された苦痛を思うと…震えが止まりません」

languages.text: “那或许是……敬畏？”{n}她盯着你的脖子，盯着你衣领下露出来的伤疤。她的瞳孔放大了，不由自主地舔着嘴唇。{/n}“一想到您曾遭受过的痛苦，我就不禁……浑身颤抖。”
languages.original_text: "Then what about... awe?" {n}She stares at your neck, right at the scar peeking out from under your collar. Her pupils dilate, and she licks her lips involuntarily.{/n} "Thinking about what you have suffered leaves me... trembling."

traits.locale_text: “那或许是……敬畏？”{n}她盯着你的脖子，盯着你衣领下露出来的伤疤。她的瞳孔放大了，不由自主地舔着嘴唇。{/n}“一想到您曾遭受过的痛苦，我就不禁……浑身颤抖。”

languages.text: "O zaman... Hayranlık diyelim mi?" {n}Direkt olarak boynuna, yakanın altından kendini gösteren yara izine bakıyor. Göz bebekleri büyüyor ve istemsizce dudaklarını yalıyor.{/n} "Çektiğiniz acıları düşünmek bile benim... İçimi titretiyor."
languages.original_text: "Then what about... awe?" {n}She stares at your neck, right at the scar peeking out from under your collar. Her pupils dilate, and she licks her lips involuntarily.{/n} "Thinking about what you have suffered leaves me... trembling."
